title: Manipulate basic species
description: In this chapter, we will learn how to manipulate some basic species. As you already know, a species can be seen as the definition of a type of agent (we call agent the instance of a species). In OOP (Object-Oriented Programming), a species can be seen as the class. Each species is then defined by some attributes ("member" in OOP), actions ("method" in OOP) and behavior ("method" in OOP).
